data.name: WorkflowFriendlyName_OrderPicking
data.comment: This value is the name operators will hear for the "OrderPicking" workflow.

data.name: VocabWord_EndOrder
data.comment: System Vocabulary Word to end an order.

data.name: VocabWord_Overflow
data.comment: System Vocabulary Word to report when there is too much product for a task.

data.name: VocabWord_OrderStatus
data.comment: System Vocabulary Word to request status of an order.

data.name: OrderPickingWorkflowActivity_StockCodeEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: OrderPickingWorkflowActivity_QuantityEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: OrderPickingWorkflowActivity_PickedQuantity
data.comment: Application label text, for quantity of current order that has been selected.

data.name: OrderPickingWorkflowActivity_PriceLabel
data.comment: Application label text, price of a single item.

data.name: OrderPickingWorkflowActivity_StagingLocationEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: OrderPickingGetContainersWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, intruction to operator.

data.name: OrderPickingGetContainersWorkflowActivity_InitialPromptSingular
data.value: Get containers for {0} order. Say next when complete.
data.comment: Spoken prompt, when picking for one order.

data.name: OrderPickingGetContainersWorkflowActivity_InitialPromptPlural
data.value: Get containers for {0} orders. Say next when complete.
data.comment: Spoken prompt, when picking for multiple orders.

data.name: OrderPickingGetContainersWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Get containers for orders\n • Say or press Next to continue
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingAcknowledgeLocationWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, current number of items remaining number of items.

data.name: OrderPickingAcknowledgeLocationWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Go to location below\n • Say or press Next to pick the item
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Are you sure you want to end your order?

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt, confirming end of a unit of work.

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Skipped items will be added to the end of the order list. Are you sure you want to skip this item now?

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Speak or Press Yes to skip this item\n • Speak or press No to continue
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmSkipEnterItemWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Skipped items will be added to the end of the order list. Are you sure you want to skip this item now?
data.comment: Application screen text, confirms skipping and item and explains wha the system will do.

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmSkipEnterItemWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Speak or Press Yes to skip this item\n • Speak or press No to continue
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt, states area of work.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_Placeholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_InfoPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt, repeats area of work if operator requests it.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Locate item with stock code on box\n • Speak, scan or type the stock code
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, intruction to operator.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_ErrorPrompt
data.value: You picked the wrong quantity! Please try again. Put {0} in Order {1}
data.comment: Spoken prompt, for mistakes while selecting.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Pick the ordered quantity for item\n • Say or type picked quantity for item\n • Say Next
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmQuantityWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Say or press Yes to confirm quantity\n • Say or press No if it is wrong
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingEnterSubProductWorkflowActivity_Placeholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: OrderPickingEnterSubProductWorkflowActivity_SubstitutionsAvailablePrompt
data.value: Substitutions are available for this item. Locate {0}

data.name: OrderPickingEnterSubProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Locate item with stock code on box\n • Speak, scan or type the stock code
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmOverflowWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Confirm to start new container for order
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingOrderStatusWorkflowActivity_InfoPromptSingular
data.comment: Spoken prompt, when only one pick remains.

data.name: OrderPickingOrderStatusWorkflowActivity_InfoPromptPlural
data.comment: Spoken prompt, when more than one pick remains.

data.name: OrderPickingGoToStagingLocationWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, instruction to operator.

data.name: OrderPickingGoToStagingLocationWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.value: Take completed orders to staging location.\nSay Next to continue.

data.name: OrderPickingGoToStagingLocationWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Take orders to staging location\n • Say or press Next to continue
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingEnterStagingLocationWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Place the container in a staging location\n • Enter the staging location
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingConfirmStagingLocationWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: OrderPickingAllDoneWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.value: All Done. To continue say next.
